thread.title: BRIEF-Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration

title: BRIEF-Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration
text:
BRIEF-Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration Sept 9 
Sept 9 Clavister Holding AB : 
* Secures private cloud for German church administration 
* Announced a deployment of its Eagle series compact next-generation firewalls (NGFW) with a church administration in southern Germany 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
